definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
a good wife and loving mother
(said of sb else's wife) a good wife
to assist one's husband and educate the children (idiom)/the traditional roles of a good wife
lit. arm-flinging shopkeeper/fig. sb who asks others to work but does nothing himself
housewife/woman of senior authority in a household/the lady of the house/hostess
to have no need to fend for oneself (idiom)/to lead a pampered life
pinyin: shi2 zhi3 bu4 zhan1 yang2 chun1 shui3

definition: variant of 賢慧|贤慧[xian2 hui4]
